meanings.sent1: The spaceship traveled intercluster to reach the neighboring galaxy.
meanings.sent2: The data was shared intercluster between the different server clusters.
meanings.sent3: The ants formed an intercluster line to transport food efficiently.
meanings.sent4: The friendship between the two groups was like an intercluster bridge connecting them.
meanings.sent5: The intercluster journey through space was filled with twinkling stars.

meanings.definition: Relating to the interaction between clusters.
meanings.sent1: The intercluster communication network improved data transfer speeds.
meanings.sent2: The intercluster rivalry led to intense competition between the teams.
meanings.sent3: The intercluster dance-off at the party was a highlight of the night.
meanings.sent4: The intercluster relationship between the cities strengthened trade connections.
meanings.sent5: The intercluster dynamics of the ecosystem fascinated scientists.
